message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth every penny, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $1000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit overpriced. I'm willing to pay $600000 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm afraid $600000 is a bit too low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $900000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product.

I can see you're a serious buyer, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $850000.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to meet you at $825000, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $795000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $825000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $812500 if you're willing to meet me at that price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $790000 for the product.
